content.rendered: In Angry Gran Run Miami game, your goal is to travel as far as possible. To accomplish this, you must jump, run, and dodge all of the obstacles that come your way. You find yourself in Miami, with the objective of reaching the finish line without sustaining any damage. This task is far from easy, so put your skills to the test and prove that even grandmas can win. Stay focused and avoid all of the obstacles that lie ahead
